    public class Legend
extends CustomPanel
implements AttributeWriteLabel
    A Legend is a CustomPanel for a legend (<legend>) of a Fieldset.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • getLabelWidget

      • getLabel

        public String getLabel()
        This method gets the label of this object. A label is some text that is permanently shown to the user in the UI in order to describe the meaning of the object and in particular its value. For elements that allow to display or edit a value the label is typically shown beside the edit/display widget. For action elements such as buttons or links the label is the actual text (lettering).
        Specified by:
        getLabel in interface AttributeReadLabel
        Returns:
        the label text. Will be the empty string if no label has been set.

      • setLabel

        public void setLabel(String label)
        This method sets the label of this object.
        Specified by:
        setLabel in interface AttributeWriteLabel
        Parameters:
        label - is the new label to set.
